title: Migrated To Nuxt Content
description: I just migrated my personal site from Statamic into Nuxt. I am using the nuxt-content module configured to be document driven.

Don't get me wrong, Statamic is also a great CMS! It is built on top of Laravel so it has a lot of features included out of the box! But that is the thing, for my use case I wanted a
